Text:
With one more race day to go, i want to express my gratitude for all your efforts to rec and up all thru this season again! I love biathlon, but due to work i cannot watch the live broadcasts. Thanx to you i have the opportunity - as the season before - not to miss a thing.

THANK YOU, BASIL!

Khanty Mansiysk Mass Start (18th Mar 2012):
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7112286
